captions.text:
Saddle up and put on your mx googles!
Cause it's time for the Red Bull Romaniacs.

It's dirty it's hard and it makes grown man
cry.

5 days of dirt, pain, exhaustion and sweat.
Get ready and start your engine, it's the

Red Bull Romaniacs
The dangers in Romaniacs. One is definitely

GPS. You know if you got of track you just
get a bit of the mark tapes and things like
that. You could struggle with that.

The most difficult part is, that I don't know
what to expect because it's a completely new

race for me.
It's been raining a lot now. And you can make
a stupid mistake anywhere and the race can change.

There are all seasoned good riders here. Taddy is here this year, Lettenbichler. I think they’re going to be
really strong in the technical part so also

in the hard parts. Obviously Letti won the
event last year so he is a good all round
rider.

It's awesome there. It's very slippery. So,
I'm tryin not to push myself to hard. Keep
the energy levels down, it's a long day.

It's been ups and downs, I broke my shoulder.
So pretty a lot of crashes I would say this

year so far. It was quiet a lot of effort
to get my broken shoulder back, you know it

takes a lot of time.
Andi, how do you feel?
I don't know what happened. At the beginning

I had problems with navigation. Than I had
a bad crash. And now I'm in the finish.
That was hard work man.
Yeah. I'm really tired. A really tough day but I enjoyed it.

You know the conditions are really hard. It
was hard to go fast. I was trying to catch

up and made a mistake I made a crash. I hit
the tree. Like straight into the tree. A big

tree. I crashed my bike and I hurt my shoulder.
This time was the one that was enough.
It’s done.

title: Red Bull Romaniacs 2010 - Day 2 - "Dangers and Risks"

comments.text:
Wrong, you should never drink any carbonated beverages containing mass 
sugar and caffiene after an extraneous workout or physical exhaustion. Why 
do you think Gatorade is not carbonated and caffeinated? Also, caffeine is 
not only a stimulant, it is a diuretic too meaning your body will be 
purging its water supply via a few different ways. One of those ways is 
speeding up the removal of liquid before it has time to hydrate you.

comments.text:
Red Bull associates itself with athletes and sports yet causes more 
obesity, diabetes, and tooth decay than standard Coke or Pepsi was ever 
able to achieve. 27grams of sugar per 8oz can, in a day a healthy person 
only needs 32grams of sugar. Red Bull has 80mg of caffeine (3x as much as 
Coke or Pepsi), which causes tooth decay and more importantly, or should i 
say ironically, causes dehydration. Redbull = Epitome of Hypocrites
comments.author: tsnb420
